website_summaries.verdict: Beautifully designed bottle that works as well as its competitors but costs less.
pros: Easily holds a 750-milliliter bottle of wine
perfect way to discreetly consume your wine
No metallic taste from the stainless steel
Keeps wine cool even after hours in sun
Bottle itself is lightweight and easy to carry, even when full
cons: Bottle exterior heats up quickly in the sun and can be hard to touch after

customer_reviews.title: Gifted and Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my best friend as a gift. I have one that is a different brand and was more expensive and looks like a wine bottle, so if I am trying to be discrete it is a clear giveaway. This Seven Fifty vacuum insulated wine growler is great. It can be passed off as a water bottle if you are trying to sneak wine or any other alcoholic concoction into an event where it is not allowed. No metallic taste and it keeps your wine at the perfect temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly does as it says! I use this on picnics and rafting trips. I was surprised when I took it on a rafting trip, everything we brought was warm due to the 95+ degree heat but when we busted out the wine from this bottle, it was still cold! Will stay ice cold for 24 hours if you put enough ice in it. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its also amazing in its ability to hold the temp of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely pink not burgundy. Its also amazing in its ability to hold the temp of my wine. Over the course of several hours the bottle will only drift 1-2 degrees from the starting temperature. All my friends get one after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Conveniently holds an entire bottle of wine! Also great for carrying water and keeping it cold. I live in Costa Rica and left my bottle with cold water in it on the front seat of my car, in the sunshine. Four hours later the water was still cold! The best! Makes a great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique & Fun Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for a wine lover- I even bought a decal to make it stand out! It holds a whole bottle, it didn't spill, and it kept the wine cold when we brought it on a hike!
customer_reviews.author: Deja H.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I can fill it with ice and ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my second purchase of this product. I love it! I can fill it with ice and water in the morning, leave it in my car all day and there is still ice and cold water for my trip home from work.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Reda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, perfect for concerts in the park, great for red or white!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift, well received! Works well and fits plenty of ... wine :)
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: All day temp control and very packable
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one from a winery in Napa. It holds a whole bottle of wine! I ordered a second when we went to Hawaii. It not only kept our ice water “iced” all day it also kept our Mai Tai’s perfectly cold too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and my wife loves it. keeps wine or any other beverage cold for an extended period. Perfect for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I purchased this bottle for the use it was intended, wine! To take camping, as I do not like to carry glass or anything fragile like that (using GSI Outdoors nesting wine glasses to enjoy the wine) can break and injure or leave broken shards where there were none... The cap fits well enough but certainly not like other growlers I own (for beer, mostly) that keep the beer from going flat, but it seals and since fizziness is not the main objective, it is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Celia Evesque

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for my back pack and gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: kuni

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any boating or camping excursion!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Stores a full bottle of wine and maintains the temperature perfectly. Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: metal taste of the growler
customer_reviews.text: got this a few months ago as a gift, used it for the first time last night, holds a 750ml bottle of wine, keeps the temperature good enough, but the only negative side is the taste of the metal inside the bottle transferred to my wine. I've looked over all the reviews to see if anyone else had had this problem, but I do not see anything about it. I would like to know how I would somehow remove that metal taste from inside the growler....Any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: sue cobb

product_meta.title: Seven Fifty Burgundy Vacuum-Insulated Stainless Steel Wine Growler - 750 mL Capacity
product_meta.description: Our burgundy inspired 750 ml double-wall wine growler is vacuum-insulated to keep wine at the perfect temperature all day.
feature_bullets: Perfectly sized to hold a full bottle of wine
Double-Wall technology prevents condensation and keeps outside wall of bottle at a comfortable temperature
Lightweight 18/8 stainless steel is 100 percent recyclable
It has no liner and will not retain odor or taste
